creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: blue night forest landscape with rocks at right and owl in ULC; seated ghostly male figure at center bottom, with elbows on knees, hair flowing upward
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
signed: LRC, in black: [Richard Holzschuh]; on back at top edge on paper fragments, in pencil: [Disconsolate Ghost (No one in the village was scared of him)]
title: Disconsolate Ghost (no one in the village was scared of him)
